author: R. Avadhani
title: Notices issued to Mamidyala residents during lockdown
description: How can we respond when not allowed to move, ask oustees
content: Even while the entire State is focusing on facing the threat from COVID19, the residents of Mamidyala in Mulugu mandal have been facing some other problem. They were served notices on Sunday night and asked to respond within seven days. However, the notices w… [+1233 chars]
